title: Typeface identification please help!
content:
Can anyone tell me what this typeface is? On the first image it's "Spring" and on the second image it's "dream". I believe both of these are the same typeface. It’s for school project and it’s really important!

Thank you!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [one.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130818181924/http:/typophile.com/files/one_3_0.jpg) | 417.81 KB |
| [two.JPG](http://web.archive.org/web/20130818181924/http:/typophile.com/files/two_0.JPG) | 250.33 KB |
author: Nordi99@gmail.com

comments.content:
Looks like: Dilworth, Silas/Vandermark  
 [http://www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/typetrust/vandermark/](http://web.archive.org/web/20130818181924/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/typetrust/vandermark/)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130818181924im_/http:/typophile.com/files/spring1_4018.jpg)
  
Dream fits except for extended stroke on /A.
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130818181924im_/http:/typophile.com/files/spring2_6616.jpg)
